script.name: plugin.guilds.puresandbox
script.sourceplaintext:
@ = wait 2000 ms @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.unistate : Universe State='bop' @ = wait 200 ms @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.unistate : Universe State='ap' @ = wait 200 ms @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.unistate : Universe State='apstart' @ = wait 200 ms @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.oldplot.unistate : Universe State='finalfury' @ = wait 200 ms
if not $a.allowGuilds * Guilds $sector = get sector from universe index: x=19, y=2 if $sector -> exists $gate.type = 7 gosub sub.ConvertHSAP end
$sector = get sector from universe index: x=18, y=2 if $sector -> exists @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.mission : Guild='bounty' Mission ID=1 Extra Data=$sector Startup=[TRUE] @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.mission : Guild='bounty' Mission ID=2 Extra Data=$sector Startup=[TRUE] end
$sector = get sector from universe index: x=8, y=5 if $sector -> exists @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.mission : Guild='assassin' Mission ID=1 Extra Data=$sector Startup=[TRUE] end
* Industritech Expansion $sector = get sector from universe index: x=7, y=18 if $sector -> exists $sector.2 = get sector from universe index: x=6, y=18 if $sector.2 -> exists $sector.2 ->set owner race to Industritech $gate = create gate: type=2 addto=$sector gateid=2 dstsecx=6 dstsecy=18 dstgateid=3 x=-62700 y=0 z=-18500 $gate = create gate: type=3 addto=$sector.2 gateid=3 dstsecx=7 dstsecy=18 dstgateid=2 x=28400 y=-500 z=1000 $hq = create station: type=Industritech Enterprises owner=Industritech addto=$sector.2 x=-1000 y=0 z=500 $hq ->add default wares to station/dock end end
$sector = get sector from universe index: x=6, y=17 if $sector -> exists $sector ->set owner race to Industritech $gate.type = 7 gosub sub.ConvertHSAP $shipyard = create station: type=Industritech Industritech Shipyard owner=Industritech addto=$sector x=-10000 y=2000 z=-11000 $shipyard ->add default wares to station/dock $ship = Ganymede $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship $ship = Daedalus $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship $ship = Prometheus $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship $ship = Artemis $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship $ship = Hel $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship $ship = Nomad $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship $ship = Lofn $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship $ship = Poseidon Hauler $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship $ship = Oedipus $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship $ship = Patroclus $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship $ship = Thesus $shipyard ->add product to factory or dock: $ship end $sector = get sector from universe index: x=6, y=19 if $sector -> exists $sector ->set owner race to Industritech $gate.type = 7 gosub sub.ConvertHSAP end $sector = get sector from universe index: x=5, y=17 if $sector -> exists $sector ->set owner race to Industritech end $sector = get sector from universe index: x=5, y=19 if $sector -> exists $sector ->set owner race to Industritech end
* Lost Colony connections $sector = get sector from universe index: x=23, y=0 if $sector -> exists $sector.2 = get sector from universe index: x=23, y=1 if $sector.2 -> exists $gate = create gate: type=1 addto=$sector gateid=1 dstsecx=23 dstsecy=1 dstgateid=0 x=-4500 y=1000 z=-44200 $gate = create gate: type=0 addto=$sector.2 gateid=0 dstsecx=23 dstsecy=0 dstgateid=1 x=-2800 y=890 z=36100 end end
$sector = get sector from universe index: x=13, y=0 if $sector -> exists $sector.2 = get sector from universe index: x=22, y=0 if $sector.2 -> exists $gate = create gate: type=3 addto=$sector gateid=3 dstsecx=22 dstsecy=0 dstgateid=2 x=32000 y=250 z=-100 $gate = create gate: type=2 addto=$sector.2 gateid=2 dstsecx=13 dstsecy=0 dstgateid=3 x=-45220 y=890 z=-8900 end end end
* kha'ak sector $sector = get sector from universe index: x=20, y=19 do if $sector -> exists $sector ->set known status to [TRUE] $sector = get sector from universe index: x=21, y=19 do if $sector -> exists $sector ->set known status to [TRUE] $sector = get sector from universe index: x=22, y=19 do if $sector -> exists $sector ->set known status to [TRUE]
$hq = get player HQ if $hq -> exists $hq ->add product to factory or dock: Quantum Processor = $hq -> add 30 units of Quantum Processor end
* New Goner temple $sector = get sector from universe index: x=14, y=7 if $sector -> exists $temple = create station: type=Goner Temple owner=Goner addto=$sector x=6300 y=-750 z=-4300 $temple ->set rotation: alpha=32768 beta=0 gamma=0 $temple ->add default wares to station/dock $sign = create special: type=104 addto=$sector x=6300 y=-750 z=-4300 $sign ->set rotation: alpha=32768 beta=0 gamma=0 $sign -> set special object video channel: -1 end = [PLAYERSHIP] -> add 1 units of Unfocussed Jumpdrive return null
sub.ConvertHSAP: $flags = [Find.Hyperspeed] | [Find.ExcludeTerranGates] | [Find.ExcludeGates] $hsap = find gate: flags=$flags, refobj=$sector, max dist=null, refpos=null do if $hsap -> exists $ret = convert gate: gate=$hsap, type=$gate.type, allow oos=[TRUE], build ship=null, disabled cutscene=[TRUE] endsub return null
